definitions.text: an amount of something available for use
offering goods and services for sale
the activity of supplying or providing something
give something useful or necessary to
examples: We provided the room with an electrical heater

definitions.text: circulate or distribute or equip with
examples: issue a new uniform to the children

definitions.text: give what is desired or needed, especially support, food or sustenance
examples: The hostess provided lunch for all the guests
